origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.get_market_trends', 'description': 'This function provides trends in the international financial market based on the sector, region, timeframe, and type of analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'sector', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The sector of the market, e.g., stocks, commodities, real_estate.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical region of the market, e.g., international, asia_pacific.'}, {'name': 'timeframe', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The timeframe for the analysis, e.g., long_term, short_term.'}, {'name': 'analysis_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis, e.g., impact, forecast.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'trend_analysis', 'description': 'The detailed analysis of the market trends, including its impact.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.get_market_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'sector'是'stocks', 'region'是'international', 'timeframe'是'long_term', 'analysis_type'是'impact'.
